tool.common_param: The following details common cross-cutting parameters used in the API
tool.description_category_parameters_explaine: The following parameters are for use exclusively with the Category API described above.
tool.description_search: Simple name search parameter. The value for this parameter can be a simple word or a phrase
tool.description_type: Optional type classification accepting a canonical name.
tool.description_url_nbds_category: Lists name usages across all or some checklists that share the exact same canonical name,i.e. without authorship
tool.detail_page: Determines the offset for the search results.
tool.detail_per_page: Controls the number of results in the page. Using too high a value will be overwritten with the default maximum threshold, depending on the service
tool.detail_searching_names: NBDS provides a way of finding name usages.
tool.support_paging: For requests that support paging the following parameters are used:
